##Give Feedback
Please take a few minutes to provide information on your value for our ocean resources. [Take our survey.](https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/OHI-Hawaii) Your resonses will be incorperated into the Hawaii Ocean Health Index and will be used to communicate the importance of our ocean to the rest of the community, managers, and industry leaders.
